name: An ancient leatherbound book
data: It decreases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It increases the users spellpoints poorly.
It has tiny armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
One who is properly educated can sometimes enhance his abilities
greatly by reading the ciphers of this book.
